title: Mastermind
description: To the Professor, the plan was simple: seduce a lonely policewoman, earn her trust, and then use her to pull off the biggest bank heist in history. In order to prepare, his number 2, the womanizing Berlin, hires a hooker.But simple doesn't mean easy, because Berlin actually hides troubled feelings towardâ€¦ his boss!Tension is escalating until the situation grows out of control when the hot-headed Berlin decides to seduce a hostage as the ultimate revenge, forever changing his relationship with the Professor.Dark Erotic Romance, bittersweet HEA. M/M. M/F. M/M/F.
author: Dina Thala
